author: Special Correspondent
text:
VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science with The Hindu presents the 6th Edition of celebrations for International Women’s Day 2016 in Coimbatore. The event is powered by PSR Silk Sarees, Coimbatore.

As part of the celebrations, a cookery contest will be held on March 9 in association with SNR College of Arts and Science at the Department of Catering Science and Hotel Management from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. The Women Heels on Wheels 4 Wheel treasure hunt will be on March 13. Interested persons for cookery and Heels on Wheels contests can register by contacting 99943 36721, 0422 – 2446721. Limited entries only. Associate partner for the event is Twin Birds, Tirupur, automobile partner Renault, hospitality partner Sree Annapoorna Sree Gowrisankar, logistics partner Coimbatore Auto Sports Club and experience partner Trio Event Managers. SNR College is venue partner for cookery competition.
title: Cookery contest today
